name: UltimateQuizShow
0:
”Alexa, open ultimate quiz show”
”Alexa, start ultimate quiz show”
”Alexa, launch ultimate quiz show”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ultimate quiz show
des:
Ultimate Quiz Show is an engaging quiz game that offers a fun and intellectually challenging experience! With a variety of topics from science, history, culture, sports to entertainment, this skill will help you learn while having fun.

Challenge yourself and your friends to see who will become the quiz champion! Your scores will be saved to track your progress and you will also have the chance to unlock exclusive questions when you achieve high scores.*

Outstanding features:

Choose from your favorite topics or play randomly.
Score and ranking system.
New questions are updated regularly.
Option to play solo or with friends and family.
Are you ready to prove your intelligence? Say: “Alexa, open Ultimate Quiz Show!” to get started today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
